channel.title: rabbitmq on YZLC
channel.description: Recent content in rabbitmq on YZLC

item.title: rabbitmq
item.description: 下载脚本 1 2 curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/rabbitmq/rabbitmq-server/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash curl -s https://packagecloud.io/install/repositories/rabbitmq/erlang/script.rpm.sh | sudo bash 安装 1 2 yum -y install erlang yum -y install rabbitmq-server 命令 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 #启动服务 systemctl start rabbitmq-server #查看状态 systemctl status rabbitmq-server #设置为开机启动 systemctl enable rabbitmq-server 添加用
